name: Higgs Boson: Timed Puzzle
description:
Higgs Boson: Timed Puzzle is a short and challenging experience where the player must rotate pieces considering the time limit to assemble a particle accelerator.
Rotate the pieces to form a geometric shape and make the particles collide with each other;

Featuring:

  • 35+ levels;
  • Relaxing soundtrack;
  • Time limit that makes the game challenging;
